Plot ArchR Region Track

ArchRRegionTrack.Rd

This function will plot the coverage at an input region

ArchRRegionTrack(ArchRProj, region = NULL, groupBy = "Clusters",
  useGroups = NULL, useCoverages = FALSE,
  plotSummary = c("bulkTrack", "featureTrack", "geneTrack"),
  sizes = c(10, 0.5, 4), features = NULL, geneSymbol = NULL,
  upstream = 50000, downstream = 50000, tileSize = 100,
  normMethod = "ReadsInTSS", threads = 1, ylim = NULL,
  baseSize = 7, borderWidth = 0.4, tickWidth = 0.4,
  facetbaseSize = 7, geneAnno = getGeneAnnotation(ArchRProj),
  title = "", ...)

Arguments

ArchRProj

ArchRProject
region

GRanges region that will be plotted in (if more that one first will be selected)
groupBy

use groupings for bulk/scTrack
useGroups

select a subset of groups for plotting
useCoverages

use group coverages for track plotting
plotSummary

summary of region track to be plotted
sizes

sizes corresponding to plotSummary
features

GRanges features to be plotted (ie getPeakSet(ArchRProj))
geneSymbol

if region is null plotting can be centered at gene start site corresponding to the gene symbol
upstream

bp upstream of geneStart to extend
downstream

bp downstream of geneStart to extend
tileSize

with of tiles to plot bulk/scTrack
normMethod

normMethod normalization column in cellColData to normalize bulkTrack
threads

number of threads for parallel execution
ylim

y-limits for bulkTrack
baseSize

size of font in plot
borderWidth

border width in plot
tickWidth

axis tick width in plot
geneAnno

geneAnnotation for geneTrack
title

verbose sections
...

additional args

Contents

  • Arguments
